summary: List of The Best Skyrim Mods on The Nexus.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]DESCRIPTION-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

This collection aims to create a better Skyrim without breaking the Lore.
It adds all the features that were foprgotten in the Original Game.
Just around 30 Mods. I use many Overhauls that change a lot in a single Mod.

[b][color=#ffff00]REQUIREMENTS--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b]

Skyrim latest Update
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
Hearthfires

SKSE or any other Programs are absolutely not required!

[color=#ffff00]LIST---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[b][u]
[color=#ff0000]COMBAT: More Action and Fun in Fights.[/color][/u]
[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13446/?]Killmove Control[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2700/?]Duel Combat Realism[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/601/?]Realistic Ragdolls and Force[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17214/?]No spinning death animation[/url]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]CIVIL WAR: You cant miss it this time.
[/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18526/?]Civil War Repairs[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8060/?]Kill them Generals[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12977/?]Immersive Patrols[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9494/?]WARZONES - Civil Unrest[/url]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]COMPANIONS: Recruit a horde and let them dance for you.[/color][/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]HORSES: Faster and Stronger.[/color][/u][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8798/?]Faster Vanilla Horses[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13348/?]Horse Armor[/url]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]NEW ITEMS: More stuff to carry around.[/color][/u][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive Weapons[/url]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]VISUALS: Make Skyrim beautiful again.[/color][/u][/b]

[color=#00ff00]1[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61995/?]Tamriel Reloaded HD[/url]
[color=#00ff00]2[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]
[color=#00ff00]3[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19446/?]The Skyrim Distance Overhaul[/url]
[color=#00ff00]4[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/?]Vivid Landscapes[/url]
[color=#00ff00]5[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url]
[color=#00ff00]6[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]
[color=#00ff00]7[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8501/?]Matso Immersive Sun[/url]
[color=#00ff00]8[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]Realistic lighting Overhaul[/url]
[color=#00ff00]9 [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50753/?]Surreal Lighting
[/url][color=#00ff00]10[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates Of Tamriel[/url]
[color=#00ff00]11[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22745/?]Footprints[/url]

12 ini 

Realvision
Sharpshooters Extreme Graphics Vision                                     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105/?

[b][u][color=#ff0000]INTERFACE: A map with roads and better menus.[/color][/u][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4929/?]A Quality World Map[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51339/?]Better Map for Falskaar/Wyrmstooth[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url]

[b][u][color=#ff0000]QUESTS: New Adventures.[/color][/u][/b]

THIRTEENORANGES                                                          http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3013861
GLARTMODS                                                                http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5258649

[b][u][color=#ff0000]NEW LANDS: New lands to explore.[/color][/u][/b]

Falskaar
Wyrmstooth
Beyond Reach
Darkend

[b][u][color=#ff0000]SPECIAL:[/color][/u][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start[/url]

author: Katoari
